banner.body-copy: You may experience forks and hash rate fluctuations as the network settles over the next ~15 days.

field-error-message.invalid-url: Es muss eine gültige URL-Adresse sein
field-error-message.password-too-short: Das Passwort muss mindestens 8 Zeichen lang sein

ludicrousConfirmationDialog.description: Der Ludicrous-Modus kann Ihr System unempfänglich machen. Bitte bestätigen Sie, dass Sie im Ludicrous-Modus mit dem Mining beginnen möchten, oder Tari Universe wechselt in
ludicrousConfirmationDialog.title: Zum Ludicrous-Modus wechseln?

warmupDialog.copy:
The birth of a proof-of-work network is special. At the beginning, the network needs to stabilize and find itself. We call this period the "warm-up phase." Contributors and those who want to support the Tari network (eg. exchanges etc.) expect the Tari warm-up phase to last ~15 days.
During this time, some irregular behavior is expected. You may experience fluctuations in block times, temporary disconnects, or syncing issues. Sometimes, your node might end up on a temporary fork and need to reconnect to the main chain.
Don't worry, miners are still earning XTM during our warm-up phase! This period allows the system to calibrate as more miners and nodes come online. No action is needed unless your node becomes stuck. Restarting or resyncing will usually resolve it. After the warm-up period, the network will transition to a more stable state.
warmupDialog.subtitle: What does this mean exactly?
warmupDialog.title: Warm up phase
